title: Fix USD value display with extended decimal precision

requirements.text: Modify the TotalAssetsDisplay component to format USD values with sufficient decimal places (e.g., 8-12 decimals) to show non-zero values for very small amounts instead of displaying 0.00

quotes: i need it to show more 000000000s so that it has some type of value displayed in wallet no matter how small it is

acceptanceCriteria: Total Assets USD value displays with at least 8 decimal places
Small token values (like 495.33682336 Infinity Coin) show a non-zero USD equivalent
Formatting remains readable and does not use scientific notation

requirements.text: Apply the same extended decimal precision formatting to individual token balance USD values in BalanceCard component
acceptanceCriteria: Individual token balance cards show USD values with extended decimal precision

requirements.text: Investigate and fix the ckBTC deposit status decoding error 'Not a vector type' that appears in useCkBtcDepositStatus hook

quotes: [useCkBtcDepositStatus] Error checking deposit status: Error: Not a vector type

acceptanceCriteria: ckBTC deposit status queries complete without decoding errors
BitcoinDepositStatus component displays pending deposits correctly or remains hidden when no deposits exist

constraints: Do not modify any files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Maintain all existing functionality in TotalAssetsDisplay and BalanceCard components
Keep the existing USD value calculation logic intact
nonGoals: Changing the token balance fetching mechanism
Modifying exchange rate calculation or API integration
Changing the overall wallet layout or navigation
